name: BIOARMA
description:
STORY :

IN 2040

"You received an sos from the research center of Pr. Lazarus,

your friend Judith work over there.

You need to help her and resolve the incident.Good luck !"

CONTROL: (Keyboard and mouse)

Use WASD to move, space to jump, left click to launch the hook, right click to shoot.

Open the map with M (that doesn't pause the game).

You can change the length of the string with W and S when hook is active.

You can play in fullscreen if you press escape.

Good game !

This is prototype was created for the Santa Game Jam.
